alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Oldham; Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 23 at 4:28PM CST until December 23 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Armstrong County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northern Randall County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Oldham County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southwestern Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Potter County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 515 PM CST. * At 427 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Valley De Oro to near Bushland to 5 miles west of Canyon, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Canyon, Lake Tanglewood, Mescalero Park, Bushland, Valley De Oro, Washburn, Umbarger, Timbercreek Canyon, and Pantex. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
